content: Lifestyle Asked by AnonymousAsked on 08 Nov 2018Any ideas for bulk cost effective and practical christmas gifts?Have to buy for about 50 people so looking at $5-$10 per pax! thanks!4 answersAnswerBump1

Gabriel LeeLevel 6. MasterAnswered on 10 Nov 2018Chocolates?0 comments0

Julie TanLevel 3. WonderkidAnswered on 08 Nov 2018I saw bulk buy crabtree and evelyn handcreams on Qoo10 during some Black Friday/Singles day promo last year. Works out to be within your budget. I think handcreams are pretty practical, but not sure if that's what you are looking for. Other stuff like stationery should be afforable as well. 0 comments0

HC Tang, Financial Enthusiast, Budgeting at The SocietyLevel 8. WizardAnswered on 08 Nov 2018Go Taobao now before and 2 days after 11th Nov and find items of your budget. It has some good and affordable items at your budget. 0 comments0
